title: 6A. Lucy Parsons: Firebrand Anarchist
itunes:title: 6A. Lucy Parsons: Firebrand Anarchist
description: In the first part of a two-part episode, Alex tells Jay about Lucy Parsons, a turn-of-the-century Anarchist and labor reformer who was born into slavery and lived most of her life in Chicago.
content:encoded: In the first part of a two-part episode, Alex tells Jay about Lucy Parsons, a turn-of-the-century Anarchist and labor reformer who was born into slavery and lived most of her life in Chicago.
